name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Training Lair
summary: Step into the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle lair and train to become a ninja. In this action-packed Kinect driven experience, use your skills to complete various missions using different Ninja Turtle weapons.
info:
• 中文名: 忍者神龟：训练穴
  • 平台: Xbox360
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 发行日期: 2014年07月22日
  • 开发: Float Hybrid Entertainment 、Krome Studios
  • 发行: Microsoft Game Studios
